name: StoicScape
description:
Recruited by a mysterious wanderer named Marcus Aurelius', battle through his daily dungeons to help him fill in the pages of his incomplete book "Meditations." Gather essence, purchase gear, fight enemies, and defeat various bosses while becoming a Stoic master.

Features:

  • Resource Management. Extract essence from each stoic trial in order to purchase stronger equipment. Experiment with various gear combinations to fit your unique playstyle while adjusting to different combat styles.

  • Daily trials and quests! Each day brings new quests to complete as you face each trial. The stoic trials are intense worlds that you must survive and complete in order to reap its rewards. For those that wish for a slower experience, you can always enter a relaxed, enemy-free, gathering mode to prepare for your next adventure.

  • Compete! Strive for excellence in global and weekly leaderboards. Top players are rewarded handsomely every week, adding a competitive edge to your philosophical journey.

  • Lo-fi Music lovers! Jam out to lo-fi beats as you gain experience, chat with friends, and chill out in your expansive world.

  • Share your experience. Use the global chat to discuss the philosophical question of the day with your fellow Stoic players.

  • Inventory Management. With over 20 items to collect in game, each player will need to make decisions about each combat scenario to give them the best chance at success!
